Key:
(This world is wrong. This is a world that has
stopped. A world that can't move into the future.)

(I knew all of that from the beginning. But in this
moment, I remembered Rinne.)

(But then, Rio and Marina appeared. There was an
existence that wanted to continue in this life, and I
think I got confused.)

(Whether my days with Rinne or a future without her
were correct, I didn't know. I spent my days like this
until finally I had an answer.)
Rinne... I've decided.
Okay. I'll trust whatever you're going to choose.
(I don't need this anymore.)
...I'll carry on the burden. You... Marina, and Rio.

It's okay, Shido. That's the correct answer. Your true
happiness... isn't here.

(I looked at the key shining in the sunset and tried to
grip it―)
Shido?!
―Mine.
Marina?!
So it was this, huh? Man, that's kind of a surprise.

Rio thought it'd be where Rinne Sonogami's memories
were, but it's only natural that it'd be where Shido
Itsuka was. I guess Rio's just a child, after all.
Marina... Why did you...?

(Marina said to move toward the future and let her
disappear. So then, why...?)

Well, I didn't really want to do this, but she asked
me to. Sorry, Shido.
Rio...

Thanks, Marina. Thanks to you, Papa... I found it.
The most important thing!

(Marina softly placed the key on top of Rio's palm.
Rio hugged the key as if it were something precious.)

Now everyone can be happy. Everyone can be really,
really happy!
No, Rio... This world shouldn't go on.

Why not? I mean at this rate, you'll be sad. Right,
Papa? You won't get to see Mama anymore. Maria-
onechan and Marina will disappear, too.
...But even then, it's still not right.

But here, you can have everything. You can have
a happy dream, live a happy life. It'll have a happy
beginning and a happy ending.

(I feel like I've heard this kind of tempting offer
before.)

(It reminds me of the girl who once appeared as an
enemy.)
Shido... Do you think Rio-chan is...

I see, Rio... You're Rinne from that moment―
You're the Ruler herself. That's why you're trying to
continue Eden, isn't it?

No. Rio is Rio. Rio just wants everyone to be happy.
That's all. If Papa and Mama are happy, that's even
better!

Rio. Even if you continue this world, I won't be
happy.

Why won't you be? Won't you be happy because you get
to be with Mama?

No, Rio, that's not it. You don't understand. To
continue this world... Do you know how lonely it is
to repeat it over and over?

Lonely? Rio ill be happy, as long as everyone is
here. And besides... Rio's world won't break like
Mama's.

(Rio's words caused Rinne to look down. The last
Eden was destroyed because of Rinne's emotional
wavering.)

(But it was going well at first. There's no guarantee
that it wouldn't happen again.)

That may be true for now. But that day will eventually
come.
When will it come?
Well...

(I had no words. How many times would we have to
go through this for her to reach Rinne's level...?
No, Rinne wouldn't know, either.)
See? It's okay, right?
You really are honest, Rio.
Marina? What's the matter?

I can't do it. Even if I know what you want, and I
want to help you―I can't accept this.
Mari...na?

You're hiding something, aren't you Rio? The fact that
you'll disappear regardless.

Rio... will disappear even if I choose this world?
Wh-What do you mean?!
...I knew it.
Rinne? What do you mean, you knew it?

...I felt it the night I held Rio-chan until she fell
asleep. It felt very nostalgic... That kind of power.
Rio-chan, you must have really been born from me.
Yeah. Rio was born from Mama. And Papa, too!
From me...?

Yeah. It's really simple. Rinne Sonogami's power
as Ruler. A part of it was always inside Shido Itsuka.
Inside me... Wait?!

(Marina's words made me realize... No... Maybe I was
beginning to sense it from within.)

(I have the power to seal a Spirit's spiritual powers
with a kiss. And during the last Eden, I kissed Rinne
and tried to seal her powers.)

(But Rinne, who was a crystallization of those
spiritual powers, was erased in the process.)
(Rio... A girl who calls me Papa", and Rinne "Mama".

Operator: Those names weren't wrong at all.)"

Key:
Rio was... born from Rinne's Spirit powers sealed
inside of me?

That's right. And Rio had a will until now, to find
the most important thing". But from beyond this

Operator: point, you don't need her right?"

Key:
Even if Eden disappears and becomes complete, Rio
Sonogami doesn't have a future.
I see...

Everyone's happiness is more important to Rio.
That's why it's fine.

(Rio was willing to sacrifice herself to continue this
Eden.)

(Even if she disappears, she wanted everyone to be
happy. That's all she wished for.)

Shido Itsuka. Don't waver over something you've
already decided. If you give up, Rio will continue this
Eden. You're a man, aren't you?
...I know. I know it. But―
That's why people tell you you're too nice.
(...I, I don't want to―)
No, Rio-chan.
Huh...? Mama...?

You... must have worked so hard without understanding
what you were doing... So that emotion... must be my
curse.
I don't get it?

I'm sorry. But I want you to listen to me. You really
are my daughter, aren't you? And my emotions put
you through pain.

You see, I don't want to disappear, either. I want to
be by Shido's side. I want him to say he loves me.
I want him to hold me. I want him... to remember me.

But even then, I've made up my mind. I'm going to
see Shido off. Because all of this is me being
selfish.
Mama... You're going to say bye to Papa?

Yes I will, Rio-chan. Or else, true happiness won't
come.
Is there such a thing as true in happiness?
There is. See, like this.
(Rinne hugged Rio. Rio leaned in comfortably.)
Rio-chan. Are you happy to be with Mama?

Yeah. It's so warm to be in your arms... It makes me
happy.

See? It's a lot easier than you think to be happy,
right?
Yeah... it is easy.
So we never needed Eden from the beginning.

But then Mama, your happiness will be gone. Don't you
want to be happy?

Thank you for thinking of me, Rio-chan. But I'll be
fine. Thanks to you, I was able to see Shido again,
and I felt so much happiness. How about you, Rio-chan?
Rio... was also very happy.

See? Happiness is always nearby. So we need to give
it back to them. The happiness that everyone is going
to find on their own, in their futures.

I understand now, Mama. I can feel it from you. From
the sound of your heartbeat.
Mama... you must really love Papa. The same as Rio!

The same? I don't know... I think I love Shido more
than you do, Rio-chan.
Nuh-uh! Rio loves Papa more! Right, Papa?!
Rio... Yeah. I love you too, Rio.

Papa... Rio knows now. True happiness is different.
I have to return everyone.
Rio... I...

Rio was happy to be with you, Papa. The family
restaurant, the sleepover, all of it was so, so fun!

I had so much fun, too. I wanted to be with you for
longer. But I'm so sorry. For being such a bad papa.
No, you're really nice, Papa. Rio is so happy.
Rio... Thank you. I was happy, too.
Hehe... Please be a lot, lot, lot more happy okay?

Got it. Leave it to me. I'll become so happy that it's
way too much.
Oh, and Marina!

What do you want, Rio? I have no plan on getting in
the way of family time.
Thanks for being with me all this time, Mother.
―?! Rio!
Mama, please.
Okay. Leave the rest to Mama.

(And then Rio returned inside Rinne. Naturally, as if
she was returning to her original place.)
Thank you... Rio.
Rio's gone, huh... Then I guess that ends my role.
Marina... Aren't you happy?

What? I have no idea what you're talking about. Don't
look at me.
You know...
(She doesn't have to act tough at a time like this.)

Guess this is farewell for us. Thanks for the nice
dream... Shido.
Marina...
Marina, don't tell me you...

No, I think she really doesn't want you to see her
face. Marina is Miss Crybaby.
If she hears you, she'll be so mad.
It's fine. I think she understands.
She has an adorable side to her, doesn't she?

Hehe. She actually has a lot of these moments.
My One-san, that is.
I'll remember that side of her, too.
Yes, please do. Now then, I'll be on my way.
Way... Where are you going?

For a walk of course. I'm going with Marina. I want to
see this town for as long as possible. Now, now,
Shido... There's someone waiting for you.
(And Maria lightly pushed my back.)
Maria...?

Please spend time with her in the end. Goodbye,
Shido. Next time, I will see you through a screen.

(And then Maria just walked off. The only ones left
were me... and Rinne.)
Everyone's gone.

...Yeah. I can return you anytime, Shido. Rio-chan is
back, but the power of Eden is inside me.
I see... Rio did disappear, then.
That's not it. Rio-chan is here.
(And Rinne placed her hand over her heart.)
―And the rest is here.
(And then she placed her hand over my heart.)
Ah... I see. You're right.
(The time I spent with Rio was etched into my heart.)

Shido... I'm going to close Eden. So I have to say
goodbye.

Right... It is time for goodbye. Come to think of it,
I wasn't able to say goodbye to you the last time.

You're right. I just said all I wanted to say and made
you cry.
How do you know that...? That I cried?
Well... That's a secret. Secrets are a girl's specialty.

I see... Well, I don't let it bother me. I mean, it's
you we're talking about.
Hehe. It's between you and me, right?
Haha. Right. Between you and me.
Ahahaha. Hey Shido...? Can I ask you one last thing?
Sure. If it's something I can do, anything.
You shouldn't say something like that.
Well, but―

(Something flowed... It smelled sweet. Before I knew
it, Rinne's face was right in front of me―and she put
her lips on mine.)
You said anything, so I did it.
Rinne...

Last time, you kissed me. So this time... it's from me.
Did I make your heart pound?

You always make my heart pound. In a lot of different
ways.

Now I'm satisfied. I really was happy. Because the me
that disappeared... thought that I would never see you
again.

Sorry. I forgot... about you. I thought I decided that I
would never forget you...

It's okay. It can't be helped. But this time... just a
little magic.

(And what Rinne offered was the spare key that
Marina took from me. But there was something I
didn't add―a pretty pink flower key holder.)
This key... And this key holder... Did you...?

Yup. I put it on when you were talking to Maria-chan
earlier. Isn't it cute?
Yes, it's cute. What... kind of flower is this?
Hehe... It's a secret.
What the heck? You could tell me, you know.

Nope. Or will you not take it unless you know the
name?

Well, of course I will. I'll take good care of it. I
promise.

It would be nice if you could use it instead of your
current key. So that even if you forget me, you can
remember me someday.
Okay, I will. Thanks, Rinne.

No, I'm the one that should be thanking you. Thank
you for all the memories, Shido... I think it's almost
time.
Yeah... It's time to say goodbye.

Don't look so sad. The end... I want you to see me
off with a smile. I'm sure we'll meet again somewhere.
You're right. I'm sure we'll meet again.

(Rinne and I must be connected somehow. So I'll
remember her again. And we'll meet again. I'm sure
we can meet again someday.)
This time, I'm going to say it. Goodbye... Rinne.
Okay. Goodbye, Shido.
Rinn―

(I reached out for Rinne, who was crying on the
inside―)

(―And the moment I was about to touch her hand, I
grabbed air.)
...I promise.

(After my second goodbye, what was left to me was
the same spare key as last time.)
No, it's not the same. Right, Rinne?

(And I shook the flower key holder on the key. It felt
like it was responding, and I thought it flashed.)
(Hmm... Not here either, huh?)
Then is it in my room?

(I entered my room and remembered for a split
second. The spare key that Kotori gave me before.
It should be inside my drawer.)

(―There it is. The small bag at the back of the
drawer. A design that looks kind of girly at first
glance.)
This, huh? Uh...

(I took it out of the bag, and unlike the simple one
I used, this one had a pink flower holder. Maybe I
put it on so I wouldn't lose it. I don't remember.)
But just one...

(I can't just give the spare to one person. Maybe I
should make a few.)

Oh, I'll change my key to this one. I might as well.
And it's easy to tell, anyways. So I'll just use it.

(So I swapped the key with the one I had and put it
into the bag. The simple one with no design went
back into the bag and I closed the drawer.)
Shido? Everyone's almost here...
Hey, what are you doing?
Hm? Oh Kotori. Sorry. I'll head over.
Hmm... What's that? A Forget-Me-Not" key holder?
Forget-Me-Not? Is that the name of the flower?

What? You put it on without knowing? It's Scorpion
grass. A flower that blooms in the spring. It means
forget me not". And it also means "true love"."

(I wonder why. The moment I heard those words, I felt
my heart pound.)
What's up with your face?
Oh... Nothing.

Really? Whatever. Anyways, I'm going to go ahead of
you.
Forget me not... and "true love" huh...

(This design may not be particularly manly, but for
some reason... it felt so natural to me. It's as if it
were something made for me.)
Good to know you.

(I said that to the key. It felt weird, but this is going
to be my long-time companion. I have to make a good
impression.)
Yeah. Good to know you, too.

(For a second, I felt like I heard someone's voice.
It felt nostalgic. Melancholic. A voice that would
make me feel that way.)
Yeah.
(I knew it was weird, but I answered.)
